item.title: vaultr 1.0.2
item.description: We are pleased to announce the first public release of vaultr, our R client for HashiCorp’s “vault”, a system for storing secrets and sensitive data and enabling these secrets to be used in applications. Vault (the server) is a little like a password manager (e.g., LastPass or Bitwarden) but designed for use within applications, rather than for storing personal passwords. With vault, you can have a central source of secrets and sensitive data (ssh keys, database passwords, ssl certificates) that can be used when deploying or using applications.
